element-citation.article-title: Is there an effect of glucose lowering treatment on incidence and prognosis of tuberculosis? A systematic review

ref.mixed-citation: 9. Jorgensen ME, Faurholt-Jepsen D. Is there an effect of glucose lowering treatment on incidence and prognosis of tuberculosis? A systematic review. Current Diabetes Rep. 2014; 14 (7):505.
